tool_description: The Email Validator API checks if an email address is valid and reliable by verifying its format, domain reachability, and whether it's from a disposable/temporary email service.
name: Email Validator
title: Email Validator

api_list.name: Check email details [DEPRECATED]

utterances.utterance: Can you check if john.doe@example.com is a valid email address?
Is the email address jane.smith@gmail.com valid and reliable?
Verify the email address alice.wonderland@yahoo.com for me.
Check if bob.builder@hotmail.com is a disposable email address.
Is the email address charlie.brown@outlook.com valid?
Can you verify the email address david.jones@icloud.com?
Is the email address emily.davis@protonmail.com from a temporary email service?
Check if frank.wilson@aol.com is a valid email address.
Verify the email address grace.hopper@mailinator.com for me.
Is the email address henry.ford@temp-mail.org a disposable email?

api_list.name: Check Email Details
api_list.description:
Validates against RFC standards
Checks if  it's from a disposable/temporary email service
Checks for MX records (if false it's probably a fake email)
Connects to SMTP to check if the account exists (`null` means SMTP wasn't reached)

utterances.utterance: Can you check if john.doe@example.com is a valid email address?
Is the email address jane.smith@gmail.com from a disposable email service?
Verify the validity of the email address support@company.com.
Check if the email address user@domain.org has valid MX records.
Is the email address temp@mailinator.com from a temporary email service?
Can you validate the email address info@website.net?
Check if the email address admin@example.com is reachable via SMTP.
Is the email address test@disposable.com from a disposable email provider?
Verify if the email address contact@business.com is valid and reliable.
Can you check if the email address fake@nonexistent.com is a fake email address?
